users.csvHelp: Format: includes headers. Each row must contain the following fields: 'identityNumber', 'name', 'firstSurname', 'secondSurname', 'email', 'role', 'university'. The 'identityNumber' field is mandatory. If you want to create an account for an existing user, the name and surname fields must match the ones stored in the database or leave them empty. The fields 'email', 'role', and 'university' belong to the account. The university must be specified by its unique name. ';' is the recommended separator, but other valid delimiters (',', tab, '|') are also accepted.
users.selectExistingUserDescription: You can search for an existing user to add a new access account
users.name: Name
users.confirmDeleteUser: Are you sure you want to delete this user? This action will also delete their access account.
users.confirmDeleteAccount: Are you sure you want to delete the access account? The user will remain but won't be able to access the system.

enrollments.csvHelp: Format: includes headers. The file must include the columns 'email', 'studyProgram', and 'academicYear'. 'email' refers to the student's email address, 'studyProgram' to the exact name of the study program (e.g., 'Software Engineering'), and 'academicYear' to the academic year label (e.g., '2025/2026'). ';' is the recommended separator, but other valid delimiters (',', tab, '|') are also accepted.
enrollments.searchPlaceholder: Type ID, name or surnames, email...
enrollments.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this enrollment?

group.csvHelpProfessors: Format: no headers. A single column containing professors' email addresses. ';' is the recommended separator, but other valid delimiters (',', tab, '|') are also accepted.
group.csvHelpStudents: Format: no headers. A single column containing students' email addresses. ';' is the recommended separator, but other valid delimiters (',', tab, '|') are also accepted.
group.name: Group Name
group.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this group?

error.atLeastOneProfessor: You must assign at least one professor to the group.
error.atLeastOneStudent: You must enroll at least one student in the group.

error.evaluationSystemNotFound: No evaluation system was found for this group's course.
error.nameTooLong: Name must be at most 100 characters long.
error.weightInvalid: Weight must be greater than 0 and up to 100.
error.minGradeInvalid: Minimum grade must be between 0 and 10.
error.duplicate: Duplicate name within the same evaluation type.
error.totalWeightNot100: Total weight for this evaluation type must equal 100%.

gradesManagement.csvHelp: Format: include headers. The first column must be 'email', and the last column 'extraordinary', the rest of the headers do not mind. Each row should start with the student's email, followed by groups of three columns for each evaluation item: (1) item name, (2) evaluation type it belongs to, and (3) grade. At the end of the row, there would be a final column with the extraordinary final grade. Example: 'student@email.com; Exam 1; Theory; 7.5; Lab 1; Laboratory; 9; 8.25'. The columns for grades can be empty. ';' is the recommended separator, but other valid delimiters (',', tab, '|') are also accepted.

gradesManagement.gradesRangeError: All grades must be between 0 and 10
